alert.note: Alert for Pope; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:59PM CDT until July 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POPE AND EASTERN SWIFT COUNTIES... At 1059 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New London, or 9 miles north of Willmar, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glenwood, Kerkhoven, Murdock, Grove Lake, Gilchrist, De Graff, Sedan, Glenwood Airport, Monson Lake State Park, Swift Falls, Long Beach and Lake Minnewaska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
